de.griefed.serverpackcreator.spring.zip

Class ZipController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.griefed.serverpackcreator.spring.zip.ZipController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/v1/zip")
public class ZipController
extends java.lang.Object
    RestController responsible for handling ZIP-archive uploads and server pack generation from the very same.

    • Method Detail

      • handleFileUpload

        @PostMapping(value="/upload")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> handleFileUpload(@RequestParam(value="file")
                                                                                                                org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
                                                                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Upload a file and check whether it is a ServerPackCreator valid ZIP-archive.
        Parameters:
        file - MultipartFile The file uploaded to ServerPackCreator.
        Returns:
        String List. A list on encountered errors, if any.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an errors occurred saving or reading the file.

      • requestGenerationFromZip

        @GetMapping(value="/{zipName}&{clientMods}&{minecraftVersion}&{modLoader}&{modLoaderVersion}&{installModloaderServer}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> requestGenerationFromZip(@PathVariable(value="zipName")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String zipName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable(value="clientMods")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String clientMods,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable(value="minecraftVersion")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String minecraftVersion,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable(value="modLoader")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String modLoader,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable(value="modLoaderVersion")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String modLoaderVersion,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable(value="installModloaderServer")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  boolean installModloaderServer)
        Request the generation of a server pack from a previously uploaded ZIP-archive, which passed validation checks, and from a barebones configuration, including:
        clientMods
        minecraftVersion
        modLoader
        modLoaderVersion
        installModloaderServer
        Parameters:
        zipName - String The name of the previously uploaded ZIP-archive.
        clientMods - String A comma separated list of clientside-only mods to exclude from the server pack.
        minecraftVersion - String The Minecraft version the modpack, and therefor the server pack, uses.
        modLoader - String The modloader the modpack, and therefor the server pack, uses.
        modLoaderVersion - String The modloader version the modpack, and therefor the server pack, uses.
        installModloaderServer - Boolean Whether to install the modloader server in the server pack.
        Returns:
        NotificationResponse with information about the result.
